languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс пристально смотрит на вас.{/n} "Известно, что кровь передает скверну. Твою склонность к еретическим деяниям еще предстоит оценить — быть может, самому Лорд-инквизитору".
{n}Heinrix looks at you closely.{/n} "It is known that corruption runs in the blood. Your propensity for heretical deeds is yet to be determined — perhaps by the Lord Inquisitor himself."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс пристально смотрит на вас.{/n} "Известно, что кровь передает скверну. Твою склонность к еретическим деяниям еще предстоит оценить — быть может, самому Лорд-инквизитору".

{n}Heinrix looks at you closely.{/n} "It is known that corruption runs in the blood. Your propensity for heretical deeds is yet to be determined — perhaps by the Lord Inquisitor himself."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente.{/n} «Sabemos que la corrupción es algo hereditario. Queda por determinar su propensión hacia la herejía... tal vez el Lord Inquisidor se ocupe de ello».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you closely.{/n} "It is known that corruption runs in the blood. Your propensity for heretical deeds is yet to be determined — perhaps by the Lord Inquisitor himself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente.{/n} «Sabemos que la corrupción es algo hereditario. Queda por determinar su propensión hacia la herejía... tal vez el Lord Inquisidor se ocupe de ello».

languages.text: {n}海因里希仔细地打量着你。{/n}“众所周知，腐化会在血液中蔓延。你的异端行为倾向还有待确定——可能要由大审判官大人亲自确定。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you closely.{/n} "It is known that corruption runs in the blood. Your propensity for heretical deeds is yet to be determined — perhaps by the Lord Inquisitor himself."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希仔细地打量着你。{/n}“众所周知，腐化会在血液中蔓延。你的异端行为倾向还有待确定——可能要由审判长大人亲自确定。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはこちらをじっと見つめる。{/n}「腐敗が血の中に流れていることは周知の事実。陛下の異端臭い行動傾向は、まだそうと言い切れませんが―きっとロード・インクィジター自ら決断されるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you closely.{/n} "It is known that corruption runs in the blood. Your propensity for heretical deeds is yet to be determined — perhaps by the Lord Inquisitor himself."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはこちらをじっと見つめる。{/n}「腐敗が血の中に流れていることは周知の事実。陛下の異端臭い行動傾向は、まだそうと言い切れませんが―きっとロード・インクィジター自ら決断されるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mustert dich.{/n} "Es ist bekannt, dass Korruption angeboren ist. Euren Hang zur Häresie gilt es jedoch noch zu bestimmen ... vielleicht übernimmt das ja der Großinquisitor persönlich."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you closely.{/n} "It is known that corruption runs in the blood. Your propensity for heretical deeds is yet to be determined — perhaps by the Lord Inquisitor himself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mustert dich.{/n} "Es ist bekannt, dass Korruption angeboren ist. Euren Hang zur Häresie gilt es jedoch noch zu bestimmen ... vielleicht übernimmt das ja der Großinquisitor persönlich."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous regarde attentivement.{/n} « Le fait est que la corruption se transmet par le sang. Votre propension pour les actes hérétiques reste à déterminer... peut-être par le seigneur inquisiteur lui-même. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you closely.{/n} "It is known that corruption runs in the blood. Your propensity for heretical deeds is yet to be determined — perhaps by the Lord Inquisitor himself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous regarde attentivement.{/n} « Le fait est que la corruption se transmet par le sang. Votre propension pour les actes hérétiques reste à déterminer... peut-être par le seigneur inquisiteur lui-même. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sana yakından bakıyor.{/n} "Yozlaşmanın kalıtsal olduğu bilinir. Kâfirce eylemlere eğilimin konusundaki karar daha sonra, belki de Lord Engizisyoncu'nun kendisi tarafından verilecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you closely.{/n} "It is known that corruption runs in the blood. Your propensity for heretical deeds is yet to be determined — perhaps by the Lord Inquisitor himself."
